text: From my experience I believe it was an SEO approach that never really made sense. The logo in the cases where it was a background image was generally on a h1 where the h1 text was hidden but intended for search - Happy to be proven wrong. I don't think it's a valid approach to SEO these days (or potentially ever).

<@UDARG2NKZ> I agree. It may have been ok 10 years ago but the current status of the web would smack that sort of usage down pretty hard. It is hard to defend the usage of your site nam ein an h1 on every page these days.
